overview: As a resourceful man looking to find the perfect room to rent, you don't hesitate to check out a room, even if it's women-only. Convince the super hot tenant, Angela White, to show you the room, then earn her trust to rent it to you. Find out something when a cute girl, Gina Valentina, also appears to see the room, and use your charm to seduce both girls for your pleasure.
title: The Cotenant
